name: Seb 2d edition
description:
Based on the game being developed called Seb! This will be the 2d side scroller action type of game! the story is a bit different though.. instead of the portal having demons coming out it turns out you got sucked into the portal! and its all 2D! but you notice something its complete replica of the school and you have well play it in 2d but it is NOT a fps game but rather a sidescroller..

oh yeah and the folder you download is a concept making folder so put concepts in there?
